author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hengdian Group DMEGC Magnetics to pay cash dividend of 1 yuan per 10 shares on May 4
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Hengdian Group DMEGC Magnetics Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 3
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 4 and the dividend will be paid on May 4
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Dny4JD
